column2: I ordered the sesame milk latte. I have to say
column3: this tasted horrible. The first sip
column4: I grimaced and it had a weird salty flavor. However
column5: my meal got better when I saw they had omonoyaki on the menu which is a unique Japanese food that consists of a poached egg
column6: cabbage flour and vegetables and meat. I have never seen this dish outside of Japan.
